Uses of Class
io.github.futures4j.Futures.CombinedFuture

  • Packages that use Futures.CombinedFuture 
    Package Description
    io.github.futures4j  

    • Uses of Futures.CombinedFuture in io.github.futures4j

      Methods in io.github.futures4j that return Futures.CombinedFuture 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Futures.CombinedFuture<T,​T> Futures.Combiner.toAnyOf()
      Returns a new ExtendedFuture that completes when any of the combined futures complete, with the result or exception of the first future that completes.
      Futures.CombinedFuture<T,​T> Futures.Combiner.toAnyOfDeferringExceptions()
      Returns a new ExtendedFuture that completes when any of the combined futures complete successfully.
      Futures.CombinedFuture<T,​List<T>> Futures.Combiner.toList()
      Combines the results of the added futures into a single future returning a List of results.
      Futures.CombinedFuture<Iterable<T>,​List<T>> Futures.FlatteningCombiner.toList()
      Combines the results of the added futures into a single future returning a List of results.
      Futures.CombinedFuture<T,​Map<Future<T>,​T>> Futures.Combiner.toMap()
      Combines the results of the added futures into a single future returning a Map of futures to results.
      Futures.CombinedFuture<T,​Set<T>> Futures.Combiner.toSet()
      Combines the results of the added futures into a single future returning a Set of results.
      Futures.CombinedFuture<Iterable<T>,​Set<T>> Futures.FlatteningCombiner.toSet()
      Combines the results of the added futures into a single future returning a Set of results.
      Futures.CombinedFuture<T,​Stream<T>> Futures.Combiner.toStream()
      Combines the results of the added futures into a single future returning a Stream of results.
      Futures.CombinedFuture<Iterable<? extends T>,​Stream<T>> Futures.FlatteningCombiner.toStream()
      Combines the results of the added futures into a single future returning a Stream of results.
